name: domadcapstone
description: New Repo for DoMAD Capstone 2019/2020 ## Who are we?

scripts.postinstall: (cd code && npm install) && (cd code && cd client && npm install)
scripts.build: cd code && cd client && npm run build
scripts.start: concurrently "cd code && npm start" "cd code && cd client && PORT=$PORT npm start"
scripts.ttheroku-postbuild: cd code && cd client && npm install && npm run build && npm start
